name: My Example Source
subtitle: A source for all of my apps
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: Final Cut Pro
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This will allow “Final Cut Pro” to find and connect with Bluetooth accessories. This app may also use Bluetooth to know when you're nearby.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow camera access to record video.
privacy.NSHumanReadableCopyright: Copyright © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app will be able to discover and connect to devices you use. You can also transfer files from other devices.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow microphone access to record audio.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is used to tag where videos are taken.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Your Photo Library is needed to access media and save videos.
